about.title: About Me
about.text1: Hi, I'm Jess (✿`꒳`)ﾉ! I studied media informatics at the Cologne University of Technology and have been working as a frontend developer since 2018. During this time I gained experience in developing single-page applications and landing pages with JavaScript and Vue.js.
about.text2: I love drawing, which is why I run a small shop on Etsy where I sell my drawings. I also enjoy playing video games and the piano.

experience.title: Experience
experience.experience1: Salesforce/Veeva CRM web applications with JavaScript/Vue.js
experience.bachelorthesis: Development of an internal company reporting system

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: Do you have any questions or would you like to contact me? Just write me an email or contact me via social media.
